import React from 'react'; import './СourseContent.module.scss'; const СourseContent = () => { const items = document.querySelectorAll('.accordion button'); function toggleAccordion() { const itemToggle = this.getAttribute('aria-expanded'); for (i = 0; i < items.length; i++) { items[i].setAttribute('aria-expanded', 'false'); } if (itemToggle === 'false') { this.setAttribute('aria-expanded', 'true'); } } items.forEach((item) => item.addEventListener('click', toggleAccordion)); return (
